commit.message: fallback to '?' for user.home if both the pw_dir and /Users/rriggs are not valid

Fallback to $HOME, if defined, if the os supplied user_home is
null or less than 2 characters long.
Fallback to $HOME if the home directory is "/" or not available

8280357: user.home = "?" when running with systemd DynamicUser=true
Fall back to the value of $HOME if getpwent.user_home is null or empty.
